job.title: IT Engineer (Office 365)
job.description: ltbrgtltstronggtLocation ltstronggtArlington VirginialtbrgtltstronggtCategories ltstronggtEngineering and ITltbrgtltstronggtReq ID ltstronggt4839ltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtOverview ltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtAre you a natural communicator and problemsolver who is excited by the ability to regularly interact with your customers and colleagues  Are you the goto in your friend circle when someone has a technical question because of your knack for explaining complex concepts Are you interested in putting your skills to work in a missiondriven organization that is helping people reach their full potential If this sounds like you read on ltbrgtltbrgtThe IT Operations team at Stand Together is seeking an IT Engineer focused on Office365 In this role you will drive best practices for over 1000 endusers and be responsible for the management administration and governance of the Office365 tenant including Exchange Online Teams Online SharePoint Online OneDrive Security and Compliance Center and more  ltbrgtltbrgtThis is a strategic role that involves innovative planning problem solving at the tier 3 level and the ability to develop strong partnerships across our IT Operations team and with our employeecustomer base Youll be part of a threeperson subteam working crosscollaboratively with other SMEs and product experts with a high sense of urgency and impact Were looking for a real thought leader and subject matter expert who is ready to take on a more entrepreneurial role ltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtYour Responsibilities IncludeltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtBuild and maintain a strategic view of Microsoft licensing and subscriptions establishing run and maintain regular review processes ltligtltligtOwn the health of the Office365 service line including maintenance and support for all Office365 services ltligtltligtServe as an escalation point and proactively mentor teammates including helpdesk support team sharing best practices and providing documentation necessary to shift left ltligtltligtStay up to date on upcoming Microsoft changes knowledge sharing and preparing for rollout with customers when applicable ltligtltligtDevelop and maintain custom PowerShell scripts for automation redundant task reporting and monitoring ltligtltligtLeverage Microsoft support contract services maximizing value gained for the organization ltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtKnowledge and Skills You Bring to the Organizationltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligt3 years Office 365 experience with 5 years experience with Microsoft Exchange  ltligtltligtProficiency in PowerShell scripting ltligtltligtFamiliarity with or experience managing email migrations between domains  ltligtltligtStrong communication skills to effectively drive recommendations priorities and projects across customers partners senior executives and organizations ltligtltligtProven experience driving business impact based on understanding of customer needs with a focus on change management and understanding customer impact ltligtltligtFamiliarity with Azure AD and Office365 authentications preferred ltligtltligtFamiliarity with DNSDHCP and Domain Management preferred ltligtltligtProven design configuration integration testing maintenance and support of Microsoft Office365 Exchange 2016 Azure Office suite and Outlook applications ltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtAbout UsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtStand Together helps social entrepreneurs supercharge their efforts to help people improve their lives We connect them with passionate partners and the resources necessary to make a greater difference ltbrgtltbrgtThrough our philanthropic community we tackle some of the nations biggest challenges so that every person has the opportunity to realize their extraordinary potentialltbrgtltbrgtStand Together partners with people from diverse perspectives and backgroundsincluding people in education business community nonprofits and public policyto accomplish more together than any of us could on our ownltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtOur ValuesltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtWorking at Stand Together is different from many other organizations We have a relentless commitment to a culture based on a business philosophy called Market Based Management  MBM   Informed by the principles that allow a free and open society to flourish MBM prepares individuals to innovate improve and transform while fostering a healthy growing organization that creates longterm value for its clients and supporters and fulfillment for its employees ltbrgtltbrgtWe believe that diversity in experiences perspectives knowledge and ideas fuels creativity broadens knowledge and helps drive success Thats why were proud to be an equal opportunity employer and strive to treat all employees and applicants with honesty dignity respect and sensitivity We welcome all qualified applicants regardless of colorrace religion religious creed sex gender or gender identity gender expression sexual orientation national origin citizenship ethnicity ancestry age physical disability mental disability medical condition pregnancy including medical needs which may arise from pregnancy childbirth or related medical conditions military and veteran status genetic information marital or familial status political affiliation or any other legally recognized protected basis under federal state or local laws regulations or ordinances  ltbrgtltbrgtPM19ltbrgtltbrgtltbrgt
